Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Hellbat/Obsidian:::

::Hellbat flew away from the battle, bored with what was going on.  Unknown 
to him, Obsidian did the same, from a different direction.    Around northern 
Africa they bumped into each other.  They each fell to the ground.  When he 
came to his senses, Hellbat looks angrily at Obsidian::
Hellbat: What the pit were you doing?
Obsdian: You ask me that?!
Hellbat: Hey, you were the crasher, i was the... crashee.. or something. Ah, 
what the hell, im gonna kill ya anyway!
::He fires at Obsidian, but Obsidian dodges and fires back. The battle 
continued, and after awhile, the two enemies are tired out::
Hellbat: Ugghh, i surrender.
::He puts his hand out to Obsdian for a shake. Obsidian just twists the arm::
Hellbat: AHHH!
::Whith his good arm he fires everything he had at Obsidian's throat.  
Obsidian fell backwards, mech fluid spewing from his mouth.  He dies 
instantly.  Hellbat, greatly weakened, struggled to stand up::
Hellbat: y-y-yesss... i-i... win....
::He falls right on top of Obsidian, and in a few minutes, he is dead::

--part1_6c.a4d7871.2826252e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
